DOC.brief_summary: The process of enhancing functional capacity of the individual in anticipation of an upcoming stressor has been termed "prehabilitation". In the present pilot trial, the impact of a multimodal prehabilitation intervention composed of exercise, nutritional supplement and psychological well-being begun in the preoperative period will be evaluated.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of the Benefits of a Prehabilitation Program : Pilot Study
DOC.criteria: Patient referred for scheduled surgery or chemotherapy for cancer Pregnant or breastfeeding Women Unablilty to walk or perform the physical initial evaluation Unability to fill questionnaires
